comments: Lalor is one of the best professors i\'ve ever had. he\'s knowledgeable, personable and just an all around nice guy. as long as you actually do the reading and try to become involved in the course, you\'ll do fine. he\'s always willing to help students and the readings are really insightful.
Fun teacher.. always upbeat.. personable guy! :)
So if I agree with him I don\'t have to work? Kewl beenz :0)

Took him when he was still teaching at University of Central OK. He\'s smart, he\'s passionate, he believes in social justice enough to put his money where his mouth is, not just words. You have to work if you disagree with him. Everyone would benefit from taking a course.
Meh...he\'s alright. Write a halfway crappy song and you\'re in.

He is a nice guy, i\'ll give him that. but he doesn\'t give you any leverage if you don\'t understand the material. Atleast thats how it seemed to me. I felt like he only taught what he wanted the class to hear. I did not like his teaching methods.

I think that Professor Lalor is one of the nicest professors at our college. He is more than willing to help anyone in the class. Lalor doesn\'t put down other majors, he actually incorporates them into his lectures so everyone can understand. If he were closed minded would he encourage students to write their own songs to perform during class?
Hey!!! Look kids!!! A walking and talking cliche!!! Wow.
